Class TranslationsDataAccess

java.lang.Object
ch.supsi.dataaccess.translations.TranslationsDataAccess
All Implemented Interfaces:
TranslationsDataAccessInterface
public class TranslationsDataAccess extends Object implements TranslationsDataAccessInterface
Provides access to translations and supported languages for both backend and frontend modules. It uses properties files to load translations and handles locale fallback mechanisms.

      the singleton instance of TranslationsDataAccess

    • getUIResourceBundle

      public Optional<ResourceBundle> getUIResourceBundle(Locale locale)
      Retrieves the resource bundle containing UI labels for the specified locale. If the locale is invalid, a fallback locale is used.
      Specified by:
      getUIResourceBundle in interface TranslationsDataAccessInterface
      Parameters:
      locale - the locale to load UI labels for
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the ResourceBundle for the specified locale, or empty if not found

    • getSupportedLanguageTags

      public List<String> getSupportedLanguageTags()
      Retrieves a list of supported language tags loaded from a properties file.
      Specified by:
      getSupportedLanguageTags in interface TranslationsDataAccessInterface
      Returns:
      a List of strings representing the supported language tags

    • getTranslations

      public Properties getTranslations(Locale locale)
      Loads translations for the given locale. If the locale is invalid, a fallback mechanism loads the default locale translations.
      Specified by:
      getTranslations in interface TranslationsDataAccessInterface
      Parameters:
      locale - the locale to load translations for
      Returns:
      a Properties object containing the translations for the specified locale

    • loadSupportedLanguageTags

      private Properties loadSupportedLanguageTags()
      Loads and returns the supported language tags. The supported language tags are loaded from a default properties file.
      Returns:
      a Properties object representing the supported language tags

    • getResourceBundlesForLocale

      private List<ResourceBundle> getResourceBundlesForLocale(Locale locale, String pathToResources)
      Retrieves all resource bundles for the specified locale.
      Parameters:
      locale - the locale to load resource bundles for
      Returns:
      a List of ResourceBundle objects for the specified locale

    • loadBackendResources

      protected List<ResourceBundle> loadBackendResources(Locale locale, String pathToResources)
      Loads all resources associated with the specified locale from the backend module.
      Parameters:
      locale - the locale to load backend resources for
      Returns:
      a List of ResourceBundle objects from the backend module

      Handles loading resources when the specified locale is invalid.
      Parameters:
      invalidLocale - the invalid locale
      fallbackLocale - the fallback locale to use
      Returns:
